title: Meaty Weapon BioSaw: Animated FPS Melee Weapon with VFX / SFX
description: Meaty Weapons are body-horror themed weapon models. The BioSaw is a biological equivalent to a chainsaw.
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=fBO_taV3uRw&feature=youtu.be


Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


Meaty Weapons are body-horror themed weapon models. The BioSaw is a biological equivalent to a chainsaw. It comes with animations, visual effects, and sound effects to offer a complete package. After the saw is started it will drip blood on the floor at a rate determined by the throttle. It will sling blood or shoot sparks depending on what you cut with it. While goring a target, it will leave blood stains on the floor. Its the perfect weapon to instill fear in your players.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:

  •  Animated BioSaw
  •  FPS arms animations
  • Two types of impact effects
  •  Particle effects
  • Decal effects
  • Sound effects

Texture Sizes: (please list resolutions for each texture)

  •  2048
  •  1024
  • 512

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: Yes, Custom

Vertex Count: 2574, 706

LODs: No

Number of Meshes: 2

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 26

Number of Textures: 33

Number of Particle Systems: 4

Number of Sound Waves: 10

Supported Development Platforms: Windows
